channel.title: Mentios (2007) - Oldschoolish PI With a New Light
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1078ihj.png[/img]
[B]Welcome to Mentios's Project Thread![/B]
[B]About us and our team[/B] Mentios is in heavy building mode, we are planning to release alpha version of Mentios in 3-4 months, we don't know a accurate release date yet, we have currently 2 active developers working in Mentios.
[B]Update Logs (Updated daily or every two days):[/B] -11.10.2012 - -Implemented Potion System. -Implemented Potion Mixing System. -Fixed some npc anims, cleaned dead codes from the server. -Changed the terrible client background, did also a deadlock fix. -Created a method for simple home teleport -Created lunar home teleport -All teleports have been repaired -MySQL System including Hiscores. -24.10.2012 - -Combat Upgrade -Base for random events -Base for random random event teleport -Sinister Chest -Added Full wizard tower with some small minigames. -Starting re-written fight caves. -Finished re-written fight caves. -Finished Mystery boxes. -Implemented "NEWS" system, that tells such as if someone achieves an 99 skill, it will tell it to everyone in the game. -Added a own place for RFD + updated quests tab for the actual quest, which automaticly takes user to the starting place. -Splitbark is now able to get in a mini-quest. -Cleaned out home it's really messy... many NPC's in one small place isn't good. -Moved a bit of npcs out of home + added new ones, fixed RFD Shop also. - Distance object method added: You can now click object from a distance instead of walking to it. (only if its put in clickobject.java! -Implemented Auto-Muting system, for spammers. (not fully tested yet)
[SPOILER="Media"] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/263kcx1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/16ab38z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/j73l2q.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29b1wep.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/17fukm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/x60b9w.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/214yuxu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15dmc1i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1znptoo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/34hb5l5.jpg[/img] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Mentios (2007) - Oldschoolish PI With a New Light
item.dc:creator: @iBattle iBattle
item.description:
@iBattle wrote:

Welcome to Mentios’s Project Thread!

About us and our team
Mentios is in heavy building mode, we are planning to release alpha version of Mentios in 3-4 months, we don’t know a accurate release date yet, we have currently 2 active developers working in Mentios.

Update Logs (Updated daily or every two days):
-11.10.2012 -
-Implemented Potion System.
-Implemented Potion Mixing System.
-Fixed some npc anims, cleaned dead codes from the server.
-Changed the terrible client background, did also a deadlock fix.
-Created a method for simple home teleport
-Created lunar home teleport
-All teleports have been repaired
-MySQL System including Hiscores.
-24.10.2012 -
-Combat Upgrade
-Base for random events
-Base for random random event teleport
-Sinister Chest
-Added Full wizard tower with some small minigames.
-Starting re-written fight caves.
-Finished re-written fight caves.
-Finished Mystery boxes.
-Implemented “NEWS” system, that tells such as if someone achieves an 99 skill, it will
tell it to everyone in the game.
-Added a own place for RFD + updated quests tab for the actual quest, which automaticly
takes user to the starting place.
-Splitbark is now able to get in a mini-quest.
-Cleaned out home it’s really messy… many NPC’s in one small place isn’t good.
-Moved a bit of npcs out of home + added new ones, fixed RFD Shop also.

  • Distance object method added: You can now click object from a distance instead of walking to it. (only if its put in clickobject.java!
    -Implemented Auto-Muting system, for spammers. (not fully tested yet)

[SPOILER=“Media”]





x60b9w.jpg728×414

214yuxu.jpg756×469

15dmc1i.jpg750×383

1znptoo.jpg756×339


[/SPOILER]

Read full topic
item.source: Mentios (2007) - Oldschoolish PI With a New Light
